ABOUT
StormHacks is hosted by SFU Surge - a newly established club at Simon Fraser University that inspires and empowers students in the tech community. We connect students with industry professionals through events such as workshops, talks, hackathons and more. We want students to take charge of their own career, so we aim to create a comfortable environment for students to learn, build, and grow together!
WHAT IS STORMHACKS?
